author: remm
msg: - Add debug statements which display the request header as sent,
and the response header as recieved if debug == 2.
- Always update the authenticate challenge if present in the response.

author: remm
msg: - Throws an exception if need to send credentials and no credentials have

author: remm
msg: - Fix for a showstopper which took me a while to find. Basically, if the
request had to be resubmitted, the response headers were merged and sent
back as part of the second request. Of course, it caused random problems.

author: remm
msg: - Use a constant for depth infinity.

author: remm
msg: - Forgot that disconnect() is actually called multiple times.
Thanks to Jason Harrop for the report.
